page.title: 12Staplehurst Monarchs.
page.content: Staplehurst Monarchs Football Club includes young players whose ages range from 8-18 years.The kit consists of red top with white collar,white stripes down the sleeves and white cuffs.Shorts are white and socks are red with white turn-overs. There are several teams within the club consisting of the Under 9s,the Under 10s and so on up to the Under 18s. The teams play approximately twenty-five games a year. The club uses the public Jubilee Field and the private Diagrits sports ground. Every year at the AGM medals and cups are given out for achievement during the year. There is the "Best Player of the Season" cup, a"Best Penalties" cup and medals for sports- manship and improvement during the season.
